column4: 2015. lefty worked as a mason for septa in philadelphia before his retirement. he was the husband of the late sally (nee rehman)and the brother of the late lucy junkerman. lefty is survived by his two daughters
column5: tanya (michael) curran and tinara wolfe; his sister
column8: karen trembly. viewing will be tues. 6-8pm and wed. 11am-12pm at norton funeral home 1232 s. black horse pike williamstown where service will be wed. 12pm. burial williamstown methodist cemetery williamstown. to sign the guestbook visit www. nfhnj. com.
